scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of individuals in prayer. In the foreground, a woman in a yellow gown with intricate red patterns and a black veil kneels on a blue cushion, her hands clasped in prayer. To her left, several other figures, predominantly women in red robes, also kneel with clasped hands. Behind them, a group of men in blue and orange tunics with red caps stand, some with their hands clasped. The background features a dark, patterned tapestry and architectural elements suggesting an interior space, possibly a chapel or a hall, with a column visible on the right.
